title: Scripting becoming stupid
body: The amount of scripters and bots recently is retarded. They cant bust a combo like a Challenger player in bronze and silver ranked. Really quite stupid. Is there  a way to report them without opening a ticket in the support forums every time? And if not, why not make a report subject for in game?

replies.body: I think a way of reporting him is by contacting the help and support services, if you know the player is scripting you have to have a picture of the name of the summoners player included as evidence in accordance to your report ticket. :>
The fact they're stuck in bronze/silver pretty much nullifies them of scripting, lmao. Yeah he's bronze, but he killed me so he's a scripter.

No. You misunderstand me. Im not saying that a bronze or silver elo player cant kill me. But the plays they can do sometimes can be ridiculous. Like a cassiopia player the other day. I was shaco, and as soon as i came out of invis. (Im talking the millisecond), He turned around from walking the other way then landed Q on me and then went to town on me with Fangs.  That all happened INSANELY quickly. I dont know many (if any)  Plat and DIa players with that sort of reaction.

I didn't misunderstand, I'm over these hackusations, it's not like League is hard to play mechanically. And yeah I have seen some questionable %%%% example of a Katarina Shunpo'ing 4 times in 0.3 seconds, but before I call that %%%% out I simply realize they most likely just spammed QWER and hoped for the best. However, Cassio is a notoriously known scripting champ and I assume that's why she was changed, as she wasn't OP when played legit, scripters just made her broken because speed on Cassio matters. But please, before you /all "%%%%ING SCRIPTER" just finish the match and watch the replay.. be warned a lot of people play with macros and from what Riot has said they're not cheating. 

However, if in the replay they move then do a full 180 and blow you up, yeah cheaters, otherwise if they were running towards you then they may just have quick reflexes. Plus not everyone in Bronze/silver sucks, I know a guy who is Bronze4 and yet he plays like a Diamond, he just cannot carry games as he loses hope to quickly and the focus is gone.
Yeah cassiopeia scripts are around (check youtube).
